mapper.select: select id, house_id, status, booking_start, booking_end, user_name, phone, email, created_at, updated_at from t_house_booking where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_house_booking(house_id, status, booking_start, booking_end, user_name, phone, email, created_at, updated_at) values (#{houseId}, #{status}, #{bookingStart}, #{bookingEnd}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

insert into t_house_booking(house_id, status, booking_start, booking_end, user_name, phone, email, created_at, updated_at) values
(#{entity.houseId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.bookingStart}, #{entity.bookingEnd}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.updatedAt})

insert into t_house_booking(house_id, status, booking_start, booking_end, user_name, phone, email, created_at, updated_at) values
(#{entity.houseId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.bookingStart}, #{entity.bookingEnd}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.updatedAt})
on duplicate key update house_id = values(house_id), status = values(status), booking_start = values(booking_start), booking_end = values(booking_end), user_name = values(user_name), phone = values(phone), email = values(email), created_at = values(created_at), updated_at = values(updated_at)
mapper.update:
update t_house_booking
house_id = #{houseId},
status = #{status},
booking_start = #{bookingStart},
booking_end = #{bookingEnd},
user_name = #{userName},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
created_at = #{createdAt},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
where id = #{id}
